article_title: The Health Care Sector Needs Innovation, Not Regulation

article_metadata.author: EconoSTATS

og.description: While problems with the U.S. health care system persist, the recent failures of the Affordable Care Act (ACA) illustrate that greater government regulation cannot cure what ails the U.S. health care industry. Deregulation that empowers private sector health care innovation can. In fact, private sector innovations, such as Dental Service Organizations (DSOs), are [...]
